metadata.synopsis: In the 1600s, Englishman Henry Morgan (Steve Reeves) is captured by Spanish soldiers. He is then bought by Dona Inez (Valerie Lagrange) and put to work as a slave in Panama. Morgan and Inez soon begin a torrid romance, but, when the woman's parents learn about the affair, they sentence Morgan to a lifetime of work aboard a Spanish ship. Morgan and his fellow slaves stage a mutiny, however, seizing control of the ship and launching a series of raids on behalf of the British Empire.

reviews: Dull but lush Technicolor action spectacular that's based on the true story of 17th-century pirate Henry Morgan.
